Name: Super Worm 3D
About the game: Super Worm 3D is a 3D platformer game. Player navigates Super Worm through levels by collecting the key and reaching the gate. Player faces many kind of entitites in each level such as trolls, mosquitos, spiders, frogs etc. Player can collect and use dynamites for them. There are three difficulty levels in the game: easy, medium and hard.
Meta Title: Super Worm 3D: Apr 28, 2020, Timon Softa and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Super Worm 3D? Check out the release date (Apr 28, 2020), developer insights from Timon Softa, and a complete game summary.
